segments.text: Ah , this is my daughter's birthday present . Her birthday is next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And when is your son's birthday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is not for a while . His birthday is only in August .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But Mark's birthday is in April so I need to think about his present soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my birthday is in December just before Xmas so of course nobody remembers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My birthday is in June , when we are always on holiday . So my family often forgets my birthday too .
segments.speaker: S2
